Categorize this review: It's not the phone that has an issue, it's flipkart. I ordered this phone on 31st of July and promised date was 4th August. But I got the phone on 6th August. Doesn't sound like much of a delay but it becomes a lot when u have a flight coming close and flipkart says your product will be delivered before 10th August. Like I could see clearly the phone is close to me (has reached my nearest hub). Now coming to the phone the display could've been better considering the price, but it's not a bumm...READ MORE
